name: Monopoly Family Fun Pack
description:
A new era of Monopoly for home consoles! The Monopoly Family Fun Pack gathers the 3 Monopoly Games:
- Monopoly PLUS: the classic Monopoly with a 3D animated board!
- My Monopoly, to create your very own board
- Monopoly Deal, a fast-paced and addictive Monopoly card-game
- The Monopoly Rabbids DLC is offered !
Enjoy the classic Monopoly in new fun ways, with your friends and people all around the world!
Video output in Full HD 1080p requires 1080p native display.
1080p HD Video Output
Offline Play Enabled
